definition: food for domestic livestock, introduce continuously
details:
noun
- food for domestic livestock
= synonyms: provender
verb
- introduce continuously
= example: introduce continuously
= synonyms: feed in
- provide with fertilizers or add nutrients to
= synonyms: fertilize, fertilise
- give food to
= synonyms: give
- take in food
= synonyms: eat
- serve as food for
- feed into
- provide as food
- gratify
= example: gratify
= synonyms: feast
- profit from in an exploitatory manner
= example: profit from in an exploitatory manner
= synonyms: prey
- move along, of liquids
= synonyms: run
- support or promote
